description: The subscription is the basic unit of resource usage in Datahub Service under Publish/Subscribe model. You can manage the relationships between user and topics by using subscriptions. [Refer to details](https://help.aliyun.com/document_detail/47440.html).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Comment.description: Comment of the datahub subscription. It cannot be longer than 255 characters.

ProjectName.description: The name of the datahub project that the subscription belongs to. Its length is limited to 3-32 and only characters such as letters, digits and '_' are allowed. It is case-insensitive.

TopicName.description: The name of the datahub topic that the subscription belongs to. Its length is limited to 1-128 and only characters such as letters, digits and '_' are allowed. It is case-insensitive.
